Reviews.Title: Loved
Reviews.Author: S. Reeves "sdreeves"
Reviews.Content: This was my first smart phone and I probably would still have it if someone didn't steal it, never dropped calls and the internal memory was decent my only issue was i couldn't send picture mail but i could receive it.

Reviews.Title: irritating defects
Reviews.Author: Courtney Bell
Reviews.Content: The SD card is constantly saying it unexpectedly removed and when you put the sd card back in it says it's damaged.  So you have to restart the phone and it takes forever.. I love having all my music on here, but honestly it's not that great of a phone.
